quiz.title: A Moment to Listen to Yourself
quiz.subtitle:
Take a second to feel your breath before answering.
Discover what your body and mind need today.
quiz.analyzing: Analyzing your answers to offer you the best recommendation...

l1.question: How do you arrive here today?

options.A: I feel my body is sending me warning signals (pain, stiffness).
options.B: My mind is very noisy or I feel emotionally tired.
options.C: I am looking for a space to deepen my self-care, without an urgent issue.

A.question: How does that message from your body manifest?

options.A1: It is something sharp or localized that limits my movements.
options.A2: It is a general feeling of heaviness, as if I were carrying a heavy backpack.

B.question: What weighs most on your inside?

options.B1: The rush, the "not getting to everything" and the constant feeling of alertness.
options.B2: A feeling of stagnation, sadness or lack of clarity.

C.question: What type of experience calls you most today?

A1.question: Has this pain appeared from a specific effort or has it been with you for a long time?

A2.question: Do you feel your body needs to release tension or needs to strengthen to support you better?

B1.question: Is it harder for you to disconnect during the day or fall asleep at night?

B2.question: Do you prefer silence to look inside or do you need someone to guide you gently?

C1.question: Do you prefer a dynamic practice or something gentler?

C2.question: Are you looking for physical or energetic work?

l4.question: Would you like to explain your discomfort or situation in more depth?

options.yes: Yes, I would like to explain further

space.title: Our Space
space.subtitle: A haven of peace in the city
space.description_1: At Arunachala, we have created an environment specifically designed for calm and introspection. Our center is conceived not only as a place to practice yoga, but as a sanctuary to disconnect from outside noise and reconnect with yourself.
space.description_2: We have a diaphanous main room, bathed in natural light and equipped with high quality organic materials. The atmosphere, impregnated with soft aromas and silence, invites deep and meditative practice from the first moment you cross the door.

about.title: Who Am I?
about.subtitle: Aru·πáƒÅchala Yoga and Therapies
about.mission: A space of care, presence, and transformation.
about.intro: My name is Susana P√©rez Gil and for years I have accompanied people through Yoga and Manual Therapies, integrating body, mind, and the emotional-spiritual dimension.
about.path_p1: My journey began more than 25 years ago, driven by a profound inspiration from India, its culture, and its spirituality. I started practicing Yoga with a simple goal: to feel physically well and maintain a stable mind. However, I soon experienced what I recognize today as the first of many leaps in consciousness.
about.specialties_intro: To offer you complete care, I have specialized in various disciplines that combine the physical with the energetic:
about.cat_manual_desc: I trained in Chiromassage, Lymphatic Drainage, Reflexology, and Acupressure.
about.cat_subtle_desc: And later in more subtle techniques such as Metamorphic Technique and Reiki. All this allowed me to understand the body not only from the physical, but also from the energetic and emotional.
about.cat_yoga_desc: I completed the Yoga Teacher Training, later expanding my training in Yoga for different life stages and moments, and deepening in the Yoga tradition as a path of self-knowledge.
about.approach: Yoga, present since the beginning, ended up becoming the central axis of my professional life, along with Massages and Therapies. During this process my love for Sanskrit and mantras was also born, a tool that continues to accompany my classes and sessions as a bridge between body, breath, and consciousness.
about.arunachala_title: Thus Aru·πáƒÅchala Yoga and Therapies was born
about.arunachala_p1:
Over time, a clear dream arose: to create an own space to unite Yoga and Manual Therapies, a place where each person could feel accompanied with respect, listening, and presence.

That dream took shape after a very special trip to India, where I lived a deeply transformative experience: the ascent to the Holy Mountain Aru·πáƒÅchala, in Tiruvannamalai. There I understood that the center that was gestating already had a name, Aru·πáƒÅchala.

A space that offers Yoga, Massages, and Therapies as a path of integral well-being, adaptation, and conscious care.
about.quote: "A place where every practice and every session is lived as an invitation to return to oneself."
about.cta_p1: At Aru·πáƒÅchala Yoga and Therapies, I offer you a space of care and presence where you can rediscover yourself. This is your place.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.subtitle: Legal information and terms of use of the website

seo.title: Legal Notice | Arunachala Yoga & Therapies
seo.description: Legal notice and terms of use of the Arunachala Yoga & Therapies website in Cornell√† de Llobregat.

identification.title: Identification
identification.company_value: Susana P√©rez Gil - Arunachala Yoga & Therapies

object.title: Purpose of the Website
object.content: This website offers information about Arunachala's yoga classes, holistic therapies and massages. By using this website, you accept the terms of use established here.

conditions.title: Terms of Use
conditions.content: The user agrees to use the website appropriately and in accordance with the law, without disseminating inappropriate content or performing actions that may damage the operation of the website.

property.title: Intellectual Property
property.content: All contents of this website (texts, images, logos, design) are property of Arunachala. You may view them for personal use, but you may not reproduce, distribute or modify them without authorization.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Arunachala strives to keep the information up-to-date and correct, but is not responsible for possible errors or omissions in the contents, nor for temporary service interruptions.

law.title: Applicable Law
law.content: This legal notice is governed by Spanish legislation. Any dispute will be resolved in the courts of Barcelona.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Information on how we treat your personal data
privacy.intro: In compliance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 (GDPR) and Organic Law 3/2018, of 5 December, on the Protection of Personal Data and guarantee of digital rights (LOPDGDD), we inform you about how we treat your personal data.

seo.title: Privacy Policy | Arunachala Yoga & Therapies
seo.description: Privacy policy and protection of personal data of Arunachala Yoga & Therapies in Cornell√† de Llobregat.

responsible.title: 1. Data Controller
responsible.content:
Owner: Susana P√©rez Gil - Arunachala Yoga & Therapies
Tax ID: [Tax identification number]
Address: Pasaje de Mateu Oliva 3, ground floor, 08940 Cornell√† de Llobregat, Barcelona
Email: yogayterapiasarunachala@gmail.com
Phone: +34 678 481 971

data.title: 2. What data do we collect?
data.content:
We may collect the following personal data:

- Contact details: name, surname, email, phone number
- Booking data: information about booked classes or sessions
- Health data: medical information relevant to therapies (only with your explicit consent)

purpose.title: 3. What do we use your data for?
purpose.content:
We use your data for:

- Class and booking management: organizing and confirming your attendance at yoga classes and therapy sessions
- Communication: responding to your inquiries and sending you information about our services
- Commercial information: sending you news, promotions or events (only if you give us your consent)
- Therapeutic attention: adapting sessions to your health needs (only necessary data and with your consent)

legal_base.title: 4. Legal basis for treatment
legal_base.content:
We treat your data based on:

- Execution of a contract: to manage your booking or registration in our services
- Consent: to send commercial communications or treat health data
- Legitimate interest: to improve our services

recipients.title: 5. Who do we share your data with?
recipients.content:
We do not sell or transfer your data to third parties. It could only be shared with:

- Service providers: email, booking management or payment platforms (under confidentiality agreements)
- Authorities: when legally required

retention.title: 6. How long do we keep your data?
retention.content:
We keep your data while:

- You maintain an active relationship with us (as a student or client)
- Until you request its deletion
- During the legally required time (tax data: 6 years)

rights.title: 7. Your rights
rights.content:
You have the right to:

- Access your personal data
- Rectify inaccurate or incomplete data
- Delete your data when no longer necessary
- Object to the processing of your data
- Limit the processing in certain circumstances
- Portability of your data to another controller
- Withdraw consent at any time

To exercise your rights, send us an email to: yogayterapiasarunachala@gmail.com

You can also file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (www.aepd.es).

security.title: 8. Security of your data
security.content: We have adopted appropriate security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss or alteration.

minors.title: 9. Minors' data
minors.content: We do not intentionally collect data from children under 14 without the consent of their parents or guardians. If you are a parent and think your child has provided us with data, please contact us.

updates.title: 10. Changes in the privacy policy
updates.content: We may update this privacy policy. We recommend you review it periodically. The last update date appears at the beginning of this document.
